name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Field Service Engineer, I bring strong technical expertise and experience in preventive maintenance and the efficient operation of welding and cutting equipment. With exceptional communication skills, I effectively interact with customers to understand their needs and deliver tailored solutions. My proficiency in managing digital platforms and providing remote services enhances customer satisfaction and operational efficiency. I leverage my technical feedback skills to ensure continuous improvement in service delivery. With a solid background in software engineering, I excel in building and optimizing systems, applying my knowledge of high-performance solutions and commitment to industry best practices.
